recipe_text: Quantity; 3; Cut up 3 apples| Measurement; 50; Measure out 50 grams of white sugar| Untimed; None; Mash apples and mix in sugar in bowl| Temperature; 200; Gather the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F| Timed; 10; Place mix in oven in ceramic dish and bake for 20 minutes| Finish; None; Serve!
title: Apple Custard
